001package Calibration_Demos_More;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import ij.ImagePlus;
005import ij.ImageStack;
006import ij.io.LogStream;
007import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
008import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
009import imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang.ZhangData;
010import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Camera;
011import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.RectificationMapping;
012import imagingbook.lib.image.ImageMapper;
013import imagingbook.lib.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
014import imagingbook.lib.settings.PrintPrecision;
015import imagingbook.lib.util.resource.ResourceLocation;
016import imagingbook.pub.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
017
018/**
019 * This plugin opens an image stack containing the 5 Zhang
020 * test images and removes the lens distortion based on the calibrated 
021 * camera parameters. The resulting (rectified) frames are shown
022 * in a new image stack.
023 * 
024 * @author W. Burger
025 * @version 2021-08-22
026 */
027public class Demo_Rectification implements PlugIn {
028
029        static boolean BeVerbose = false;
030
031        static Class<?> resourceRootClass = ZhangData.class;
032        static String resourceDir = "resources/";
033        static String resourceName = "CalibImageStack.tif";
034
035        static {
036                LogStream.redirectSystem();
037                PrintPrecision.set(6);
038        }
039
040        public void run(String arg0) {
041                // open the test image (stack):
042                ResourceLocation loc = new imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang.DATA.RLOC();
043                ImagePlus testIm = loc.getResource(resourceName).openAsImage();
044
045                if (testIm == null) {
046                        IJ.error("Could not open calibration images!");
047                        return;
048                }
049                testIm.show();
050                String title = testIm.getShortTitle();
051
052                // get the camera intrinsics (typically by calibration):
053                Camera camera = ZhangData.getCameraIntrinsics();
054
055                // create a special geometric mapping
056                Mapping2D mapping = new RectificationMapping(camera);   // inverse, ie., maps target to source
057
058                // rectify the images and create a new stack:
059                ImageStack distStack = testIm.getStack();
060                final int w = distStack.getWidth();
061                final int h = distStack.getHeight();
062                final int M = distStack.getSize();
063                ImageStack rectStack = new ImageStack(w, h);
064                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
065                        IJ.showProgress(i, M);
066                        ImageProcessor source = distStack.getProcessor(i + 1);
067                        ImageProcessor target = source.createProcessor(w, h);
068                        ImageMapper mapper = new ImageMapper(mapping, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic);
069                        mapper.map(source, target);
070//                      mapping.applyTo(source, target, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic);
071                        rectStack.addSlice("frame"+ (i + 1), target);
072                }
073                new ImagePlus(title + "-rectified", rectStack).show();
074        }
075
076}
